snippet: A Mexican drug gang leader pleaded guilty in El Paso to federal charges that he masterminded the killings of three people connected to a United States Consulate in Mexico.
abstract: Mexican drug gang leader Jose Antonio Acosta Hernandez pleads guilty ito federal charges that he masterminded the 2010 killings of three people in Ciudad Juarez, Mexico, who were connected to a United States Consulate in the country.
lead_paragraph: A Mexican drug gang leader pleaded guilty in El Paso to federal charges that he masterminded the killings of three people connected to a United States Consulate in Mexico.

headline.main: Mexico: Gang Leader Sentenced in U.S.
headline.print_headline: Mexico: Gang Leader Sentenced in U.S.
